messages.subject: Samurai and Ninja collectible figures
messages.msgSnippet: Hello! We research Japan history and produce Samurai and Ninja figures based on historical resources. We will be happy to know your opinion or see your
messages.messageBody:
Hello!

We research Japan history and produce Samurai and Ninja figures based
on historical resources. We will be happy to know your opinion or see
your criticism. We also looking for contacts in Japan to move our
products to Japanese market.

New models of Ninja and Samurais are available on our web site:
http://tinbay.com/index.php/cPath/37

Complete old catalog on Samurais soldiers at our web site:
http://www.tinbay.com/downloadpdf/japan/index.htm

Best Regards,
Boris
